summary: This module implements the core functionality for sending media over a WebRTC connection. It defines a container for encoded media frames and a sender class that handles encoding, RTP packet creation, RTCP feedback processing, transport management, statistics collection, and dynamic replacement of the underlying media track.
business_intent: Provide applications with a reliable and standards‑compliant way to transmit audio or video streams in real‑time, managing codec operations, packet scheduling, feedback handling, and performance metrics required for WebRTC communication.
